meanings.definition: Short branched extension of a nerve cell, along which impulses received from other cells at synapses are transmitted to the cell body.
meanings.sent1: The dendrites of the neuron help carry messages to the brain.
meanings.sent2: The dendrites receive signals from other cells and pass them along.
meanings.sent3: The dendrites of the nerve cell were like tiny messengers running to deliver news.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts traveled along the dendrites of her mind, connecting memories.
meanings.sent5: The dendrites look like tree branches, reaching out to gather information.
